name: Adpocalpyse
description:
Game Summary:

Players have to press the big red button to save levelup KL. But to do so, there are many ads blocking them from reaching that big red button, everytime a player presses on the wrong button a new ad will appear. Shut them all down and hit that button and save levelup KL!

Developers:

Team D at SEA Game Jam 2019, hosted by IGDA Malaysia @ Levelup KL.

Members:

Ryan Chen (Designer)

Chris Lee Yi (Sound)

Alex Tan(Programmer)

Zack (Programmer)

Poon Wai Wah  (Artist)
